sec.title: Isolation of external electrical energy sources

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: Rigs supplied with external electrical energy shall be fitted with means to isolate them from all energy sources. Such devices shall be clearly identified and it shall be possible to lock them if reconnection could endanger exposed persons. The requirements of ISO 14118 and IEC 60204-1 shall be met.

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: After the energy is shut off, it shall be possible to dissipate any energy remaining or stored in the circuits of the rig without risk to exposed persons.

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: As an exception from the above requirements, certain circuits may remain connected to their energy sources, e.g. to hold parts in position, to protect information, to provide interior lighting. These circuits shall be clearly identified in the instruction handbook. They shall have permanent warning labels.
